txt.en: 'A fine load of firewood, [placeholder]! It must have taken you a great deal of effort to chop this up. The people of Wildermore thank you!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Cut firewood for the people of Wildermore ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A skilled forester such as yourself can help the refugees of Wildermore by chopping firewood for them.
'If there is anything that all the people of Wildermore need, it is firewood. As a forester, this is something you can make in great quantities, is it not?'
Hildelith has given you a recipe for firewood.\n\nYou should cut firewood for the people of Wildermore, so that they may stay warm at night.
Hildelith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have cut some firewood and should now deliver it to Hildelith.
